title: America in Vietnam
creator_credit: Don North, Paul Lang, Ron Kelly, Ian Macleod, Cinequity Funding and Information Television Productions
brief_description: A preview of the series “Vietnam: the ten thousand day war”, covering America’s shifting motivations and priorities during three decades of the Vietnam conflict. The conflict became America’s longest, costliest, and most mysterious war and involved five presidencies. Written by Pulitzer Prize winner, Peter Arnett and narrated by Richard Basehart.
